trans-unit.source: Defines an ordered list of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReference" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: 定義已排序的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReference" /> 項目清單。

trans-unit.source: When associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>, the order of the elements that the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReferenceCollection> contains should be the same as the document order that is defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.
trans-unit.target: 當相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>，項目的順序，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReferenceCollection>包含應該是文件順序中定義相同<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>。

trans-unit.source: The element to add to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合結尾的項目。

trans-unit.source: Adds an element to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入至集合的結尾。

trans-unit.source: Basic collection support.
trans-unit.target: 基本集合支援。

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an element is added or removed.
trans-unit.target: 新增或移除元素時發生。

trans-unit.source: The destination array to which the elements from the collection should be copied.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的項目所應複製到的目的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting index within the array where the collection elements are to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 將複製集合項目的陣列內以零起始的開始索引。

trans-unit.source: Copies the whole collection to an array that starts at a given array index.
trans-unit.target: 將整個集合複製到自指定陣列索引開始的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Basic collection support.
trans-unit.target: 基本集合支援。

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements that are in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of items that the collection contains.
trans-unit.target: 集合包含的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator for iterating through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可逐一查看集合的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that you can use to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可用來逐一查看集合的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element in the collection to get.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中取得的項目之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that is at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 取得位於指定之索引的項目。

trans-unit.source: The collection element that is at the specified <paramref name="index" />.
trans-unit.target: 位於指定之 <paramref name="index" /> 的集合項目。

trans-unit.source: Basic collection support.
trans-unit.target: 基本集合支援。

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref:System.Collections.IList>.<xref:System.Collections.IList.Item%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.Collections.IList>。<xref:System.Collections.IList.Item%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回逐一查看集合的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Use the type-safe <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReferenceCollection.GetEnumerator" /> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 請改用類型安全的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReferenceCollection.GetEnumerator" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 物件，可用於逐一查看集合。
